org.tmotte.pdfrpt

Class PageInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tmotte.pdfrpt.PageInfo

  • public class PageInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains information about page size and margins, and is used by SimplePDF's constructor.
    See Also:
    SimplePDF.SimplePDF(java.io.OutputStream, PageInfo)

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new instance of PageInfo that has the same properties as other.

      Creates a new PageInfo with page sized according to pageSize and with the specified top/right/bottom/left margin values.

      Gets the total height of the page, including margin space.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PageInfo

        public PageInfo(com.itextpdf.text.Rectangle pageSize,
                float topMargin,
                float rightMargin,
                float bottomMargin,
                float leftMargin)
        Creates a new PageInfo with page sized according to pageSize and with the specified top/right/bottom/left margin values.
        Parameters:
        pageSize - Specifies the page height/width. PageInfo's LETTER_PORTRAIT, LETTER_LANDSCAPE, LEGAL_PORTRAIT and LEGAL_LANDSCAPE variables are convenient shortcuts to common settings; see iText's PageSize class itself for more.

      • PageInfo

        public PageInfo(com.itextpdf.text.Rectangle pageSize,
                float margin)
        A shortcut to PageInfo(pageSize, margin, margin, margin, margin)

        public float getWidth()
        Gets the useable width, i.e. the distance between left and right margins

        public float getHeight()
        Gets the useable height, i.e. the distance between top and bottom margins

        public com.itextpdf.text.Rectangle getPageSize()
